description: This easy chickpea salad is great in sandwiches, folded into lettuce leaves, or on its own!
keywords: chickpea salad recipe, easy chickpea salad, Mediterranean Pesto Chickpea Salad
name: Mediterranean Pesto Chickpea Salad
recipeIngredient: 1 15-ounce can black olives, drained and coarsely chopped
1 15-ounce can artichoke hearts, drained and coarsely chopped
2 roasted red bell peppers (seeded and coarsely chopped)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, coarsely mash the chickpeas using a potato masher. You want about half to be really well mashed, but the rest can be coarsely mashed or even whole.
Toss the chickpeas with the black olives, artichoke hearts, and roasted red peppers. Stir in the pesto, according to taste. Season to taste with salt and black pepper.
